#include <iostream>
#include <stdio.h>

using namespace std;

long long a[100000], n, i, dp[100000], cs, no, cou[100005];
int main() {
    int t;
    scanf("%d", &t);

    while (t--) {
        scanf("%lld", &n);
        cs = -100000;
        no = 0;
        for (i = 0; i < n; i++) {
            scanf("%lld", &a[i]);
        }

        dp[0] = a[0];
        cou[0] = 1;
        for (i = 1; i < n; i++) {
            if (dp[i-1] + a[i] == a[i]) {
                dp[i] = dp[i-1] + a[i];
                cou[i] = cou[i-1] + 1;
            } else if (dp[i-1] + a[i] > a[i]) {
                dp[i] = dp[i-1] + a[i];
                cou[i] = cou[i-1];
            } else {
                dp[i] = a[i];
                cou[i] = 1;
            }
        }
        for (i = 0; i < n; i++) {
            if (cs < dp[i])
                cs = dp[i];
        }

        for (i = 0; i < n; i++) {
            if (cs == dp[i])
                no += cou[i];
        }
        printf("%lld %lld\n", cs, no);
    }

    return 0;
}
